mapper.select: SELECT Q.QCM_NO, Q.QCM_CODE, Q.QCM_NAME, M.MTL_NO, P.PDT_NO, Q.QCM_TARGET_VALUE, Q.QCM_MAX_VALUE, Q.QCM_MIN_VALUE, C_UNIT.CMN_DETAIL_NAME AS QCM_UNIT, Q.QCM_METHOD FROM QCM Q JOIN MATERIALS M ON M.MTL_NO = Q.MTL_NO JOIN PRODUCTS P ON P.PDT_NO = Q.PDT_NO JOIN COMMONCODE_DETAIL C_UNIT ON C_UNIT.CMN_DETAIL_CODE = Q.QCM_UNIT
